attributes.title: github_pull_requests_comments_help
attributes.visState:
{"title":"github_pull_requests_comments_help","type":"markdown","params":{"fontSize":12,"markdown":"#### GitHub Pull Requests Comments and Collaboration

* **Number of pull request comments and reviews** gives an idea of the activity at different levels, from Project to individuals.
* **Collaboration Network** shows people as **nodes**. **Node size** is the number of Pull Requests they created. **Edges** link people commenting and reviewing on the same pull request thread. **Edge size** represents the number of comments and reviews.
* **Tables** offer a view of the comments activity split by project, repository, and individual, allowing to compare among them.

**Note**: ratios are calculated as specific count (`+1` or `all reactions`) divided by total count (`Pull Requests + comments + reviews`).

[See complete dashboard documentation](https://chaoss.github.io/grimoirelab-sigils/panels/github-pull-requests-comments-and-collaboration/)"},"aggs":[]}
